p: For the acute toxicity study, female Swiss albino mice aged 8–12 weeks were used. Either sex of Sprague Dawley (SD) rats (3–4 months age) were used for the main study. Animals were obtained from the Department of Pharmacology and Toxicology, School of Pharmacy, Mekelle University. Animals were housed in a room with 12-hour light/12-hour dark cycles and provided with standard pellet feed and water ad libitum. The animals were acclimatized to the experimental environment prior to use for the study.
